title: Rule 18

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Choose a role to 'start" and a role to "end."
-Change the position of your starting role and ending role.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-All players with a role in between the role to "start" and to "end" are rerolled to another role outside of the barrier. This effect is temporary and players can gain back their roles if you change your starting or ending role.
-Your starting and ending role may not have more than 20 posts of distance.
Example:
I choose Nervous Sleeper to start and Oct2 to end. Those are Post 2 and Post 8. If Post 4 Role Jury was in the game, it would be rerolled because Post 4 is in between Post 2 and Post 8.
